Text:
A very good search tool.  If you are not able to search a scecific volume by right clicking a volume, this problem is caused by CommandLineToArgvW converting the trailing \ into a "    

* Click Start -> Run.
    * Enter Regedit.
    * Open HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\Folder\shell\Search Everything...\command
    * Remove the trailing " from the (Default) value.
